Burning ISO images onto CDs and DVDs can be a hassle, especially if you're not tech-savvy. But, with Free ISO Burner, the process becomes seamless and straightforward. 

In this article, we'll discuss the features of this software, how to use it, and why it is a must-have tool for your computer.

## Features

### Supports Various File Types

Free ISO Burner supports various file types, including ISO, IMG, BIN/CUE, NRG, and MDF. You can burn these images onto CDs, DVDs, and Blu-ray discs, making it an all-in-one solution.

### Supports Multiple Drives

With this software, you can select any drive on your computer to burn your image. This flexibility allows you to use the software on any computer without worrying about compatibility issues.

### Simple User Interface

Unlike other CD/DVD burning software that comes with a steep learning curve, Free ISO Burner comes with a simple, user-friendly interface. The software also has a drag-and-drop function that allows you to add files easily.

### Burn Speed Control

The software allows you to control the burn speed, which comes in handy when burning large files. You can choose to burn at a slower speed, which ensures that your files are burned correctly and without any errors.

## How to Use Free ISO Burner

Using Free ISO Burner is straightforward. Here is a step-by-step guide:

1. Download and install the software from the official website.

2. Insert a blank CD, DVD, or Blu-ray disc into the drive.

3. Launch Free ISO Burner.

4. Click the "Browse" button and select the ISO file you want to burn.

5. Select the burner drive.

6. Choose the burn speed.

7. Click "Burn."

The burning process will begin, and once it's complete, you can eject the disc and use it to install the software or access the files.

## Conclusion

Free ISO Burner is a reliable and straightforward software that allows you to burn ISO images onto CDs, DVDs, and Blu-ray discs without any hassle. The software is easy to use, supports multiple file types and drives, and comes with a simple user interface. 

Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned computer user, Free ISO Burner is a must-have tool on your computer.
